Level.campaign: Actual Lizard Tactics Jam Map for Pride
Level.Objective: Reclaim the theater and cast out all enemies!
Level.Script: Set Lesbian Talkable AddStatus/Kyat,Talkable AddStatus/Nobeta,Talkable SetString/Nobeta Can Talk,Nobeta
Set Lesbian Not Talkable RemoveStatus/Kyat,Talkable RemoveStatus/Nobeta,Talkable SetString/Nobeta Can Talk,INVALID

Asandr Progresses Script SetVal/Asandr Name Progress,+:1 IfValRun/Asandr Name Progress,=,4,Swap Out Unit,Swap Out Name,Sandra Winterbloom,Swap In Name,Asandr Winterbloom/ IfValRun/Asandr Name Progress,=,3,Swap Out Unit,Swap Out Name,Rasand Winterbloom,Swap In Name,Sandra Winterbloom/ IfValRun/Asandr Name Progress,=,2,Swap Out Unit,Swap Out Name,Rasand Winterbloom,Swap In Name,Andras Winterbloom/ IfValRun/Asandr Name Progress,=,1,Swap Out Unit,Swap Out Name,Drasan Winterbloom,Swap In Name,Andras Winterbloom/

Swap Out Unit Run/Store Character Stats,Prefix,SwapOut,Character Name,-STR:Swap Out Name- RemoveUnit/-STR:Swap Out Name-,false SpawnUnit/0,-STR:Swap In Name-,-VAL:SwapOutY Coord-,-VAL:SwapOutX Coord-,-STR:SwapOutFacing-,,,-STR:SwapOutInventory String-,false Run/Load Character Stats,Character Name,-STR:Swap In Name-,Prefix,SwapOut AddTextOverlay/Facing is '-STR:SwapOutFacing-'

Store Character Stats SetList/Variables To List,Accuracy|Dodge|Counter Limit|Experience|Level|Morale|Perception|Psy|Reflexes|Slash Res.|Pierce Res.|Crush Res.|Mental Res.|Heat Res.|Cold Res.|Shadow Res.|Light Res.|Poison Res.|Speed|Strength|Health|Salary|X Coord|Y Coord|Drain|Damage|Turn Ended InvToList/-STR:Character Name-,-STR:Prefix-Inventory List ForLoop/-ii-,0-LASTINLIST[-STR:Prefix-Inventory List],1,SetListEntry,-STR:Prefix-Inventory List,-ii-,LIST{-STR:Prefix-Inventory List,-ii-}[E] ListToString/-STR:Prefix-Inventory List,:,-STR:Prefix-Inventory String ForLoop/-ii-,0-LASTINLIST[Variables To List],1,SetValByStat,-STR:Prefix-LIST{Variables To List,-ii-},=,-STR:Swap Out Name-,LIST{Variables To List,-ii-} SetStringByStat/-STR:Prefix-Sprite Set,-STR:Character Name-,Sprite Set SetStringByStat/-STR:Prefix-Facing,-STR:Character Name-,Facing

Load Character Stats SetList/Variables To List,Accuracy|Dodge|Counter Limit|Experience|Level|Morale|Perception|Psy|Reflexes|Slash Res.|Pierce Res.|Crush Res.|Mental Res.|Heat Res.|Cold Res.|Shadow Res.|Light Res.|Poison Res.|Speed|Strength|Health|Salary|Drain|Damage|Turn Ended ForLoop/-ii-,0-LASTINLIST[Variables To List],1,Run,Load Character Stat Subroutine,Prefix,-STR:Prefix-,Character Name,-STR:Character Name-,Stat,LIST{Variables To List,-ii-} SetStatByString/-STR:Character Name-,-STR:Prefix-Sprite Set
SetStatByString/-STR:Character Name-,-STR:Prefix-Facing
Load Character Stat Subroutine SetValByVal/NextLoadedStatValue,=,-STR:Prefix--STR:Stat- SetStatByVal/-STR:Character Name-,-STR:Stat-,=,NextLoadedStatValue

Dialogue.Branch: / Run/Set Lesbian Not Talkable SetVal/Lesbian Discussions Count,+:1 IfValGoTo/Lesbian Discussions Count,=,1,Go To First Lesbian Dialogue IfValGoTo/Lesbian Discussions Count,=,2,Go To Second Lesbian Dialogue IfValGoTo/Lesbian Discussions Count,=,3,Go To Third Lesbian Dialogue EndConvImmediately/
/ LoadConv/First Lesbian Dialogue
/ LoadConv/Second Lesbian Dialogue
/ LoadConv/Third Lesbian Dialogue
/ SetVal/Turn Trigger,+:1 IfValRun/Lesbian Discussions Count,l,3,Set Lesbian Talkable IfValRun/Asandr Name Progress,=,1,SetString,AndrasReadyToShave,Andras Winterbloom Run/BossSpawnProgress GoTo/1
/ IfValGoTo/TurnsUntilBossAppears,=,0,2 EndConvImmediately/ Continue./NextBranch

Rubble Rouser Boss/Hey;; I'm rousing here! And this is a boss fight now. SpawnUnit/1,Rubble Rouser Boss:,7,17,Left,,Add:LevelUp:9,, SpawnUnit/1,Rubble Rouser Golem:,8,16,Left AddPortrait/Rubble Rouser Boss,Rubble Rouser Boss,left,,Angry Continue./EndConv

/ SetVal/Lesbian Discussions Count,=:0 Run/Set Lesbian Talkable SetVal/Asandr Name Progress,0 SetString/Asandr Current Name,Drasan Winterbloom SetArea/Clothing Zone,0,8,0,4 SetString/AndrasReadyToShave,INVALID SetArea/West Approach,0,16,0,4 SetArea/Dressing Room Door,0,3,0,4 SetArea/Theater,0,8,4,16 SetArea/Outside Hut,8,13,6,12 SetVal/TurnsUntilBossAppears,=:-1 SetVal/Turn Trigger,=:0 Run/Swap Out Unit,Swap Out Name,Drasan Winterbloom,Swap In Name,Andras Winterbloom EndConvImmediately/
Kyat/Wow;; this would be a discussion! Our first one;; I think. AddPortrait/Kyat,Kyat,left AddPortrait/Nobeta,Nobeta,right SetStat/Kyat,Morale,+:2 SetStat/Nobeta,Morale,+:2 Continue./NextBranch
Nobeta/Isn't this our second conversation? Well then. AddPortrait/Kyat,Kyat,left AddPortrait/Nobeta,Nobeta,right SetStat/Kyat,Morale,+:2 SetStat/Nobeta,Morale,+:2 Continue./NextBranch
Kyat/This is our third conversation. Well;; I guess that's it then. AddPortrait/Kyat,Kyat,left AddPortrait/Nobeta,Nobeta,right SetStat/Kyat,Morale,+:2 SetStat/Nobeta,Morale,+:2 Continue./NextBranch

Clark/Man, I really don't wanna fight you. I was really hoping someone else would handle you... look at those arms! You could tear me apart! AddPortrait/Clark,Clark,left AddPortrait/Harrien,Harrien,right Continue./NextBranch
Harrien/...Well, that just sucks all the fun out of fighting you. What's someone so meek doing with this lot? Continue./NextBranch
Clark/I... really don't know. I've been trying to find where it went wrong, but all I can really conclude is that I made very dumb decisions. Continue./NextBranch

Harrien/Sounds like a lot of us, honestly. ...Look, I can't undo the stuff you've been dealt;; but I can offer you an out. C'mon and join us! If you're on the field, you must have some skill, right? Continue./NextBranch
Clark/W-w-what? Um, I... no;; I'd really just weigh you down. Continue./NextBranch
Harrien/Hey, c'mon;; look at these guns. A little extra weight won't bug me. Continue./NextBranch

Clark/...W-well;; okay. ...Thank you. SetStat/Clark,Army,=:0 RemoveConv/Clark Dialogue RemoveStatus/Clark,Talkable RemovePortrait/Clark AddPortrait/Clark,Clark,left SetStat/Clark,Morale,=4 RemoveConv/West Approach Recognized Continue./NextBranch

Drasan Winterbloom/Oh, what do we have here? [Drasan sees an open container of clothes for performers] This is... AddPortrait/Drasan Winterbloom,Drasan Winterbloom,left,,Quizzical Continue./NextBranch
Drasan Winterbloom/[Drasan nervously grabs an outfit from the chest] AddPortrait/Drasan Winterbloom,Drasan Winterbloom,left,,Concerned Continue./NextBranch
Andras Winterbloom/I could... use a change. Run/Asandr Progresses Script AddPortrait/Andras Winterbloom,Andras Winterbloom,left,,Happy PortraitParticles/Andras Winterbloom,Heart Continue./NextBranch

Andras Winterbloom/If I can change anything, then... [Andras carefully presses a sword to their lip] SetString/AndrasReadyToShave,INVALID AddPortrait/Andras Winterbloom,Andras Winterbloom,left,,Nervous Continue./NextBranch
Rasand Winterbloom/...that feels much better. Run/Asandr Progresses Script AddPortrait/Rasand Winterbloom,Rasand Winterbloom,,Happy PortraitParticles/Rasand Winterbloom,Heart Continue./NextBranch

Clark/I mean;; maybe the author made a small mistake about the bolt-head manufacturer, but-- AddPortrait/Clark,Clark,left,,Worried AddPortrait/Irate Crossbow Aficionado,Irate Crossbow Aficionado,right,,Sad Continue./NextBranch
Irate Crossbow Aficiando/A small mistake! Lakshmi would never be caught dead wi- [The scuffle outside rattles the windows] Continue./NextBranch

Irate Crossbow Aficionado/Argh;; there's never enough time to educate arbalest-ignorants! Let's teach them proper technique! AddPortrait/Irate Crossbow Aficionado,Irate Crossbow Aficionado,right,,Mean Continue./NextBranch
Clark/Uh... alright... Continue./NextBranch

Clark/[He sighs] I thought that boss guy was cute enough to spend a weekend with his pals, but... Second thoughts. ClearPortraits/ AddPortrait/Clark,Clark,right,,Sad AddStatus/Clark,Talkable RemoveTagFromGroup/1,Passive Continue./NextBranch
/ SetVal/TurnsUntilBossAppears,=:1 EndConvImmediately/
Kyat/Finally wearing something comfortable, huh? AddPortrait/Kyat,Kyat,left,,Happy AddPortrait/Sandra Winterbloom,Sandra Winterbloom,right,,Happy Continue./NextBranch
Sandra Winterbloom/Ahah, yea, this... felt more fitting. Just wish I could do something more with my hair. Continue./NextBranch
Kyat/Y'know, I actually do have something for that. Continue./NextBranch
Kyat/And... there. Run/Asandr Progresses Script PortraitParticles/Asandr Winterbloom,Sparkles AddPortrait/Asandr Winterbloom/,Asandr Winterbloom/,right,,Happy Continue./NextBranch
Asandr Winterbloom/Aaah, I love it! And should write different, better, or more dialogue here to express that! :D Continue./NextBranch
